parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The service code. You can query the service code by calling the **QueryProductList** operation.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: The type of the service. You can query the service type by calling the **QueryProductList** operation.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: subscription
*   PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go
